account.descriptionLink: With current market activity low and HadesDAO having current assets to deploy for initiatives this proposal would redirect 50% of the current EcoFund and 50% of EcoFund distributions to purchasing Underworld NFTs at a rate of 450 Hades per NFT (in sol) or better. These NFTs would be staked with the emissions directed to the HadesDAO
account.name: 6 Month Temporary Utilization of EcoFund for Underworld NFT acquisition

account.descriptionLink:
Learn more about The Warp here:
https://medium.com/@redgaltsol/abc-ordinals-420395201f87

Hadeswap will build the following but will not implement them until the Crayon Council gives final approval:

1. ABCs will stop receiving $hades emissions through staking at Hadeswap.

2. All ABCs will be unstaked and available immediately with no fee or cooldown period.

3. ABCs will then receive 1 free UW per ABC they migrate from Solana to Bitcoin using the official migration tool for The Warp. The UW reward will only be available for the first 4 weeks of The Warp opening. The UW received will be automatically staked at Hadeswap.
account.name: ABC Changes to Support The Warp

account.descriptionLink:
Hadeswap would like to run a proposal to activate its market making bots (for NFTs) in order to ensure improved liquidity around floor prices across most NFT collections.

Liquidity (SOL - NFTs) to be pulled from POL. This can result in loss/profit, any profit will be reinjected back in POL.
account.name: Activating Market Making bots for Hadeswap

account.descriptionLink:
TL;DR:

- Create vote-escrowed $HADES (veinHades) which represents locked $HADES
- Starting conversion is 1:1 ratio between $HADES and veinHades
- Change the POL profit split to fuel veinHades pool:
* 10% EcoFund (unchanged)
* 40% buy back & burn $HADES (same buying pressure)
* 50% buy $HADES and send to veinHades pool (same buying pressure)

Ratio of redeem will grow as the pool grows (see Sushi/mSOL model & detailed proposal below)

veinHades pool = MDS Insurance Fund = POL Profit + MDS Profit

Full detail here:

https://purple-maren-77.tiiny.site/
account.name: Introduction of veinHades

account.descriptionLink:
Introduction:

Tensor has been working in close collaboration with Hadeswap for the last few months to release app.hadeswap.com and constantly improve on each iteration of the platform.

The purpose of this proposal is to cement further this already strong relationship between the two teams.

Read full below:
https://exchange.art/single/EF3Qnx5NzHtJpYEF1MmU76eYsMGnbUxFYJf6D8pKAXMn

https://drive.google.com/file/d/19YNn4hZ5EAKZKRMlJnpBSxVRx51Vs_9H/view?usp=sharing
account.name: HadesDAO Grant to Tensor

account.descriptionLink:
The Ecosystem Fund, originally established with a noble purpose, currently sits idle due to the absence of any parties willing to build upon Hadeswap and claim it. 

Consequently, it is advisable to allocate the 10% of fees generated by the POL towards its enhancement (at least for the foreseeable future). This approach will not only fortify the protocol but also indirectly benefit $HADES holders through a gradual increase in buy pressure over time.

The present proposal seeks to discontinue all existing uses of the Ecosystem Fund, redirecting the associated fees back into the POL.
account.name: Re-purpose ecosystem fund to growth fund aimed at increasing POL

account.descriptionLink: This proposal would use 2,000 $SOL from the POL $SOL reservers to aquire and burn $HADES tokens. Hadeswap bonding phases took in significant amount of NFTs and SOL but there has been a increase in value of several NFT pools, like Claynos and DeGods, the increase in $SOL price and decrease in $HADES price.  This enables the Hadeswap protocol to rebuy token it distributed at a discount from what it had sold them for during Bonding Phase 1 and 2.
account.name: Use of Early POL Profits Re-purchase $HADES Distributed for Bonding at Discount

account.descriptionLink:
Proposal to recover the funds to sugar daddy HGE coming from the SMB acquisition

This proposal aims at enabling HGE to fully recover the funds received through the SMB acquisition whenever those funds would be received on the multisig.

The total amount shall be no greater than the transaction amount agreed between both parties during the acquisition of the SMB IP by the MonkeDAO, being $2,000,000 USDC/USDT minus $100,000 of operating costs for Hadeswap, thus $1,900,000 total.
account.name: Proposal to recover the funds to sugar daddy HGE coming from the SMB acquisition

account.descriptionLink:
The ABC Treasury will purchase 200 Underworlds from Hadeswap at a cost 70k $hades (350 $hades per Underworld). The Underworlds will come from the 30K total that are planned to be released.

The 70k hades will be directed towards the veinHades rewards pool.
account.name: ABC Treasury Purchase of 200 Underworlds

account.descriptionLink:
Stop the auction of 42 SMB ordinal monkeys, reassess strategy cohesively. As hadesDAO SMB IP owners, rushed non-hyped monkey mint lacks marketing and economic benefit. Let's prioritize long-term brand reputation and economic growth by exploring alternative usages for the SMB IP brand. 

- White Stache BonkeDAO
account.name: Stop SMB ordinals auction & mint.

account.descriptionLink:
LunarProject/LunarDAO was the first ever project launched on Hadeswap. With one of the best 3D art in the Solana ecosystem, LunarProject has huge potential to become top 3 NFT projects on Solana once merged with HadesDAO team.

Proposing HadesDAO to acquire LunarProject/LunarDAO for 515,364 $hades token.

Read full below:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SEgRPziYkRShICGwAo6QeS4hLhImtkLh/view
account.name: HadesDAO acquire LunarProject/LunarDAO

account.descriptionLink:
Currently the Profit of the POL is split as following: 
* 10% EcoFund 
* 40% buy back & burn $HADES 
* 50% buy $HADES and send to veinHades pool

I think it would be beneficial to have 10% of the POL profit reinvested into the POL to increase our Revenue over time ( to reduce IL and increase POL value)
Proposal to split POL profit as following:
* 10% EcoFund 
* 10% Reinvested into the POL
* 40% buy back & burn $HADES 
* 40% buy $HADES and send to veinHades pool
account.name: Changing of POL profit tokenomics

account.descriptionLink:
transfer the entire balances of the POL and NFT wallets to 7B5c2w9Sck2j34fRW43E6GRzYBx1DL2HMKAVtJGu2ng4

POL Wallets:
C9ifWgFu8NiX2xAn3Cx3CcwRaL1uastZVGDzZpa3nZXP

NFT Wallet:
Fzx2MEY6fuwjoL1g4Mh5D6dcxp24HEcdZ1QsrVxE5sfs

Withdraw all tokens from DeFi protocols (kamino, meteora), and delist all NFTs from hadeswap now transfer all the SPL tokens and NFTs to SOL address 

Apart from this The proposal must be followed within 10 hours of approval.
account.name: Transfer POL

account.descriptionLink:
LunarProject was the first ever project launched on Hadeswap. 

Proposing HadesDAO to acquire LunarProject for 300,000 $hades token which will be locked in LunarDAO for 1 year. As per the pNFT upgrade Lunar is in the prime seat to capture the full royalty revenue, Lunar has accumulate 161k SOL volume up to date with potential to achieve 500k SOL trading volume per year ( $500k royalty to the HadesDAO for $hades buy back and burn )

Full Thread: https://twitter.com/lunarprojectnft/status/1634238798732115982?s=20
account.name: Establish strategic partnership between HadesDAO & Lunarproject

account.descriptionLink: Passing this proposal would remint SMB Gen2 #2777 officially as part of the collection and transfer the token to DU4EJnA2z5HbnW8CzAuad9mVoe3cGycjU2HgAksTWVPp
account.name: Reminting of SMB Gen2 #2777

account.descriptionLink: Give HGE $1000 for a night at the strip club for all his work
account.name: Get Suger Daddy some bitches

account.descriptionLink:
Passing this proposal would grant @LtLollipop9 a McD Happy Meal (delivery fees included) to ease his angst and bring back good vibes.
 Send 15 $hades (~$15 USDC) from HadesDAO treasury to DU4EJnA2z5HbnW8CzAuad9mVoe3cGycjU2HgAksTWVPp
account.name: Send Mcd Happy Meal to Lolli

account.descriptionLink:
Integrate the Solana Bonk Business project into the next phase of Hadeswap's bonding of Protocol-Owned Liquidity (POL) when it opens up.

More info in the forum: https://discord.gg/hadeswap
account.name: Integrate Solana Bonk Business into the next bonding phase.

account.descriptionLink: Passing this proposal will stop the progress of SMB Gen 2 to the pNFT Standard. SMB Gen2 royalties generated are used to burn $HADES. Payment of royalties are encouraged based users views and the desire to support the broader Hades ecosystem through token burns.  Royalties paid on sales after the approval date of this proposal will enable access to future potential benefits with SMB Gen2 including but not limited to opt-in for royalties on IP use of SMB Gen2s by the team (doesn't inhibit individuals from licensing their SMBs), staking emissions and/or whitelist for future SMB collections.
account.name: Stopping the progress of Solana Monkey Business Gen 2 to pNFT

account.descriptionLink:
NFTFi is a new concept that requires careful nurturing and hand-holding. 
Accept a low-price floor collection to bring new users into the protocol. The benefit is the number of users on the platform who will be more prone to test it since the economic risk is minimal. 
https://www.wordcelclub.com/whitestache.sol/integration-of-bonkedao-into-hadeswap-stable-coin-midas-to-attract-new-users-and-increase-liquidity
account.name: Integration of BonkeDAO into Hadeswap Stable Coin Midas to Attract New Users and Increase Liquidity

account.descriptionLink:
All proceeds from instant unstaking of ABCs at hadeswap shall be sent directly to the ABC community treasury at: Pwtj1MpJSoPyKE5EcJYdHrgDtkR2DNoHiJauL1eW4TK. All funds from instant unstaking - past, current and future - shall be sent to this wallet.

Nominated ABC community members will control this treasury via multisig agreement. The funds in this treasury will be allocated towards initiatives that have the explicit goal of furthering the ABC community.
account.name: Use of proceeds from ABC instant unstaking

account.descriptionLink: Cogent Cogs are a backed asset representing 15 cgntSOL per NFT. This suggests that the NFT price should be close to this backed price offering a strong opprotunity to establish a low delta low fee liquidity pool that runs a low risk of being bought out or fully dumped into. Due to this I submit this proposal to add Cogent Cogs v2 to the first Bonding phase post mint.
account.name: Integrate Cogent Cogs v2 into Hades and the next Bonding Phase post Cogs v2 mint

account.descriptionLink: Currently more and more funds are aggregating user funds to actively manage Hadeswap pools by establishing a fee on withdraw Liquidity providers will pay a minor tax for the use of these tools WITHOUT impacting users buying from the platform. This proposal will enable a minor revenue share for $HADES holders locked in the HadesDAO giving incentive to hold and lock the tokens out of circulation.
account.name: Establish a 1% fee on all fees withdrawn from Hadeswap Pools to be distributed to $HADES locked in HadesDAO

account.descriptionLink: Passing this proposal would remint SMB Gen2 #2777 officially as part of the collection and transfer the token to DU4EJnA2z5HbnW8CzAuad9mVoe3cGycjU2HgAksTWVPp
account.name: Remint SMB Gen 2 #2777

account.descriptionLink:
Formalization of the proposal put forward by Genuine Articles on Twitter.

 https://twitter.com/genuinearticles/status/1643784166129954821
account.name: Purchase of SMB IP by the Galactic Geckos

account.descriptionLink: Initiate a 1% fee for all hadeswap swaps to be distributed to all $Hades tokens locked in the realms Hades DAO as revenue share based on their % weight.
account.name: Initiate 1% fee on all swaps to be distributed on a weight basis to governance staked HADES

account.descriptionLink: Cogent Cogs is minting their v2 protocol which represents 0.01% of their validator revenue per NFT. Because the assets is backed it produces an interesting collection to add to POL as the NFTs are backed by stable revenue. Worse case if the protocol is dumped into it will have NFTs backed by validator revenue.
account.name: Integrate Cogent Cogs v2 into Hades and the next Bonding Phase post Cogs v2 mint

account.descriptionLink:
MonkeDAO proposes to purchase the Solana Monkey Business (SMB) IP including all rights, assets, accounts, and keys from HadesDAO for $2,000,000 USDC. MonkeDAO believes the SMB project and all holders of the SMB Gen2 NFTs will benefit from this acquisition and that HadesDAO will benefit more from money in its treasury rather than maintaining ownership of the SMB project. The terms of the proposed transaction are the result of a concerted effort between HGE and MonkeDAO’s leadership to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

This proposal will run for 3 days, payment has been organised.

Full proposal: https://tinyurl.com/5xpvhbz6
account.name: MonkeDAO to Purchase SMB

account.descriptionLink:
DC has been building products on Solana for a year and a half. These range from Staking, Raffles/Auctions, Gambling and now focused on NFTFi with their new NFT/Token AMM but can build any product required.

They are proposing to become SMBs core development studio focusing on building for DC-SMB

DETAILS:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/17teIZS8O987nGxIC_xDHw5cBIIlsbWzwgoZSSEuo1mU/edit?usp=sharing
account.name: Doge Capital become the development studio of SMB

account.descriptionLink:
Proposal:

Allowing users to release their staked assets immediately upon payment of a fee. Users will have the option to either wait 21 days to unstake or they can unstake immediately  by paying the fee

The fee for this service would be payable in $Hades token, 123$hades(If $hades rises in the future, we can launch a new proposal to modify this amount). No matter how many days are left off the unstaking period, the fee will remain the same

The $Hades collected as fees would be deposited into the POL account of Hadeswap. The governance of Hadeswap would  decide on the future utilization of these funds
account.name: Adding Additional Unstaking Mechanics

account.descriptionLink:
The protocol has acquired a large number of ABC over the past month but HadesDAO does not have any staked for emissions. This proposal would pull 50 ABC (109 currently in POL at time of proposal), transfer them to the ownership of the HadesDAO which would then be staked for emissions.

This pulls a significant number of ABC out of circulation and produces emissions over time for the HadesDAO
account.name: Withdraw 50 ABC from POL and transfer to HadesDAO.

account.descriptionLink:
Due to text limits on realms, the full text of the proposal can be found at: https://tinyurl.com/8dmdu8vr

Summary:
MonkeDAO would exchange the following for control over the SMB Project and all associated rights:
-5 SMBs (#841, #4413, #488, #2132, #4712) - Representing 0.1% Governance in MonkeDAO to be held by HadesDAO
-50% of SMB Gen2 Royalties will be directed to the HadesDAO until March 31st, 2026. 
-$100,000 USDC paid to the HadesDAO treasury
account.name: Transfer of SMB IP and Ownership to MonkeDAO

account.descriptionLink:
The ABC Treasury will purchase 200 Underworlds from Hadeswap at a cost of 70k $hades (350 $hades per Underworld). The Underworlds will come from the 30K total that are planned to be released.

The 70k hades will be directed towards the veinHades rewards pool.
account.name: ABC Treasury Purchase of 200 Underworlds

account.descriptionLink: In recognition of MonkeDAO role in the shaping of much of SMBs Culture and Reputation the HadesDAO is granting requesting a grant of 10,000 $HADES tokens to be distributed to the MonkeDAO's Treasury. The tokens are to ensure the MonkeDAO has the ability to submit protocols and have an initial governance weight in HadesDAO, which owns the SMB IP. The tokens are requested to be held by the MonkeDAO for no less than 1 year from the date of the grant.
account.name: HadesDAO Grant to MonkeDAO for Governance Tokens

account.descriptionLink:
The protocol has acquired a large number of ABC over the past month but HadesDAO does not have any staked for emissions. This proposal would pull 50 ABC (109 currently in POL at time of proposal), transfer them to the ownership of the HadesDAO which would then be staked for emissions. 

This pulls a significant number of ABC out of circulation and produces emissions over time for the HadesDAO
